DOC.brief_title: Platform Switching v Regular Platform Implants . One Year Results From RCT
DOC.detailed_description: This study design randomise , control , split-mouth trial . Eighteen patient , bilaterally miss single bicuspid molar one sit restore randomly assign treat accord platform-switching concept ( PS group ) , match implant-abutment diameter , ( RP group ) . A total 36 implant , ( 18 Nobel Replace Tapered Groovy PS , 18 Nobel Replace Tapered Groovy ) , bilaterally instal . All implant insert insertion torque 35 45 Ncm , heal healthy bone heal abutment connect time . Both implant delay load screw retain temporary crown 3 month implant insertion screw retained definitive crown 2 month later . Outcome measure implant survival , biological prosthetic complication , radiographic marginal bone-level change , soft tissue parameter ( PPD BOP ) . Clinical data collect baseline 6 12 month . Statistical analysis conduct use computational program SAS ( version 9.2 ) , 1-away ANOVA F-test . Statistical significance test 0.05 probability level , value present mean standard deviation 95 % confidence interval .
